name: Shroomish

evolution.description: Shroomish can evolve into Breloom at level 7 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 10 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Mushroom Pokémon. If Shroomish senses danger, it shakes its body and scatters spores from the top of its head. This Pokémon's spores are so toxic, they make trees and weeds wilt.

abilities.name: Effect Spore
abilities.description: When hit by a melee attack, roll a d4. On a 4, deal an amount of grass damage equal to your proficiency modifier to your attacker.

abilities.name: Poison Heal
abilities.description: This Pokémon does not suffer the disadvantage effects of the poisoned status. In addition, this Pokémon recovers half of all poison damage it would take, including the damage at each of the end of its turns.

abilities.name: Quick Feet
abilities.description: When suffering from a negative status condition, this Pokémon’s speed increases by 15 ft.
